XenotypeDef.label: fenrisian
XenotypeDef.description: Fenrisians are the feral sons of Leman Russ - the vicious wolfmen hailing from Fenris by the Space Wolves.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Fenrisians are the feral sons of Leman Russ - the vicious wolfmen hailing from Fenris by the Space Wolves.

XenotypeDef.label: tiskan
XenotypeDef.description: tiskans are the mystical sons of Magnus the Red; the scattered cabals of sorcerers pulled to Prospero by the Thousand Sons.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: tiskan are the mystical sons of Magnus the Red; the scattered cabals of sorcerers pulled to Prospero by the Thousand Sons.
